content: Another of his dangerous combo moves will start with a quick shout and an upward thrust of his blade followed by a quick jab. He'll then adopt a strange pose by lifting a leg up, only to dash at you with extreme speed for a final two-hit strike that can be dodged or deflected to get him off-balance.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Non-White.md', within the main section titled 'Non-White', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Non-White' and the sub-subsection 'Non-White Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Another of his dangerous combo moves will start with a quick shout and an upward thrust of his blade followed by a quick jab. He'll then adopt a strange pose by lifting a leg up, only to dash at you with extreme speed for a final two-hit strike that can be dodged or deflected to get him off-balance.
